original_text: While this was happening, the people outside were waiting for Zechariah. They were thinking, ‘Why has Zechariah stayed for such a long time in the special room? Why has he not come out yet?’
korean_text: 백성들이 사가랴를 기다리며 그가 성전 안에서 지체함을 이상히 여기더라

sentences.original_text: the people outside were waiting for Zechariah
sentences.korean_translation: 바깥에 있던 사람들이 스가랴를 기다리고 있었다

sentences.original_text: 'Why has Zechariah stayed for such a long time
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 스가랴가 그렇게 오랫동안 머물러 있는가

sentences.original_text: Why has he not come out yet?'
